item.description:
INDIVIDUAL BODY-MIND ANALYSIS SESSIONS with Jen & Tony - First time offered in the states!!!!

WHAT ARE THE ISSUES IN YOUR TISSUES? WHY ARE YOU IN THE SHAPE YOU'RE IN?
www.inyourbodyoutofyourmind.com

NEW ENGLAND ITINERARY

Wed Sept 22nd – Mini Face Readings @ The Growing Green Co-op & Alchemy Café in Hartford, CT 6:30-8:30pm $20 for 10 min reading

Thurs Sept 23rd – Free Talk "Your Soul Purpose" & Mini Face Readings @ The Growing Green Co-op & Alchemy Café in Hartford at 7:30pm

Friday Sept 24th – Book a Private Session: Transformative Life Style Analysis @ Growing Green Co-op in Hartford

Sat & Sun Sep 25-26– Mini Face Readings at the Natural Living Expo in Sturbridge, MA

Monday, Sept 27th - Book a Private Session: Transformative Life Style Analysis @ Growing Green Co-op in Hartford

Monday, Sept 27th- Free Talk "Why and I in the Shape I'm In" & Mini Face Readings @ Location TBA at 7:30pm

Tuesday, Sept 28th – Face Reading: All Day Course from 9:30-7:30PM @ Growing Green Co-op in Hartford

1/2hr Mini Family Reading $55 Also Available!

Hartford workshops & sessions will be held @ The Growing Green Co-op Located at 203 New Britain Ave ~ www.growinggreenevents.com Email Imani@thegreenvibration.com to book a session!

Transformational Life Style Analysis

• PRIVATE 2.5 HOUR BODY ANALYSIS SESSION $200
* Complete Body Analysis (8 pg report)
* Posture Analysis and corrections (with pictures)
* Face Split picture and male/female energy analysis
* Soul and Personality Numbers, their related Attributes and Challenges *


•PRIVATE 1 HOUR LIFE STYLE ANALYSIS SESSION $125
*Face Split picture and male/female energy analysis
*Verbal posture analysis and correction
*Soul and Personality Numbers, their related Attributes and Challenges*

*If data is received 48 hours in advance of appointment

ONE SESSION CAN START THE CHANGES YOU WANT IN YOUR LIFE!

PSYCHOSOMATIC THERAPY
Your thoughts, your life experiences and environmental conditioning have become the habitual patterns that run your mind. These patterns are downloaded into the body to create the physical shape you're in; your thought creates your form.
Psychosomatic Therapy and Body Mind Analysis is designed to release cellular memory of emotional pain and restore your body to its natural state of health. The therapy seeks to impart love, compassion and understanding through awareness, acceptance and action. An alternative to weekly talk therapy, a single postural correction session will give you months of direction.
item.name: FREE TALK & Private FACE READING sessions
